results.content: Mostly definition of security and how it is important took so many lectures it became boring.

results.content: There's some great information in this course! Sean does a great job explaining security issues and threats and how to address them. He also discusses several of the most popular WordPress security plugins and explains how to configure them.  I recommend this course.
results.content_html: There's some great information in this course! Sean does a great job explaining security issues and threats and how to address them. He also discusses several of the most popular WordPress security plugins and explains how to configure them. I recommend this course.

results.content: This is a good intro course to WordPress security. Easy to follow and understand. Nice set of security plugins explained.  Also, I had a question and it was promptly answered.  Thank you, I enjoyed it.
results.content_html: This is a good intro course to WordPress security. Easy to follow and understand. Nice set of security plugins explained. Also, I had a question and it was promptly answered. Thank you, I enjoyed it.

results.content: Was my first course on tha topic and I got all out what i wanted. Information what is attacked, plugin names that worked succesfully and small tutorial for them. Thank you for that nice course.
results.content_html: Was my first course on tha topic and I got all out what i wanted. Information what is attacked, plugin names that worked succesfully and small tutorial for them. Thank you for that nice course.

results.content: The course is very informative and well planned. I learnt a lot on security from it. I rated it four stars not because of its lack of content but because on many of the live demos, the font size was tiny and the zooming was not deep enough.

results.content:
Everything is easy to understand, especially for non-techs such as myself.
It is not boring, but easy and interesting to follow.
results.content_html:

results.content:
Most people probably do not realize that they need to pay attention to the security of their site. In this course, Sean Kaye not only educates you on what the most common security concerns are, but also walks you through, step by step, on how you can radically improve your overall security posture.

While seasoned security pros may not get a lot out of the course, those of us with minimal experience in site security will be able to go to sleep soundly at night knowing that we have our house in order.

Not only do you need to buy this course, you need to buy it right now while you are still thinking about it!
results.content_html:

While seasoned security pros may not get a lot out of the course, those of us with minimal experience in site security will be able to go to sleep soundly at night knowing that we have our house in order.

Not only do you need to buy this course, you need to buy it right now while you are still thinking about it!

results.content: This course has everything that you need to know about securing your WordPress site. Sean is easy to understand and concise in his explanations. He really lays it all out for you and shows you exactly what to do while still being generic enough that you can apply the knowledge to your own tools. Overall this course is a great and simple way to learn to massively improve your security.
results.content_html: This course has everything that you need to know about securing your WordPress site. Sean is easy to understand and concise in his explanations. He really lays it all out for you and shows you exactly what to do while still being generic enough that you can apply the knowledge to your own tools. Overall this course is a great and simple way to learn to massively improve your security.

results.content: Another WP home run for Sean Kaye! This is essential security information for WordPress site owners. Even though this course is for beginner, non-technical, and users looking for simple solutions, an intermediate user like me was still able to get updated with some current information and suggestions. I am definitely going to heed some of his advice on the issues that I wasn't aware of. Ignoring WP security can be a huge time or money headache, and this course is a preventive aspirin for that. I can't recommend it enough. And I can barely wait for another course from Sean :)

I can't recommend it enough. And I can barely wait for another course from Sean :)

results.content: This was a little more info than I understood, really. But I'm going to watch the videos again about what to do when you first set the wordpress site up. What I liked most about this course is that the instructor answers questions and makes sure the students understand.

results.content:
If I would create a course for WordPress security it would have been just like this one. It includes everything that every conscious WordPress user should know before calling security professionals to rescue what can be rescued (if at all) after website security breach.
And since WordPress sites will be more and more popular the need for secure them will be even more important. Enroll in this course and stay on the safe side.

results.content: Brilliant course and Sean has a great relaxed style :)

results.content: From the first few lectures, it appears that this is exactly what I need.  We launched a site in November and we were immediately  spammed.  The site was down for about a week, I was able to get the site back up and running but not at 100%.  Before I add back the meeting rooms, comments, discussion boards, etc., I need to bring in the knowledge and tools that will  provide the site with the best possible security and offer me a major level of comfort.  This course looks like it will do the job.
